DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess gastrointestinal effect dietary fiber healthy , adult volunteer .
DOC.detailed_description: The study blind , cross-over design subject complete three , two-week treatment period , separate two , two-week washout . Volunteers consume dietary fiber two treatment period two dose level . The fiber add food dispensed subject consume twice day treatment period . During control period , subject receive study food , add fiber . Major outcome include fecal weight , responses questionnaire assess fecal characteristic , bowel habit gastrointestinal tolerability .
DOC.criteria: healthy men woman age 18 54 year BMI < 30 kg/m2 presence GI serious disease know affect GI function recent use antibiotic high fiber intake use medication know affect GI function presence allergy study food
